participant_2.background:
I am of mixed race and I am proud of my heritage.
I keep my blue and hazel eyes open and take mental notes of the world around me.
I collect cosplay props to bring my favorite characters to life.
My family is important to me, and I like to share stories about them with my children.
I'm struggling with school but I'm happy with my family.

content.text: Hi there!  What's your favorite thing to do?
I love to spend time with my family and children.  I'm also a huge fan of cosplay!
I love my family too!  And cosplay is so much fun!  What are some of your favorite characters to cosplay as?
My favorite characters to cosplay as are Sailor Moon and Raven from Teen Titans!  What about you?
I love Sailor Moon too!  My favorite character to cosplay as is Flash!  I love the Flash's super speed, and I think the costume is really cool.
Flash is a great choice!  He's one of my favorite superheroes too.  I love his super speed and his sense of humor.
My favorite thing about Flash is his ability to connect with people.  He's always there to help those in need, and he always finds a way to make everyone laugh.  What do you love most about Flash?

I love that Flash is always there to help people.  He's a true hero, and he always finds a way to make the world a better place.  I also love his sense of humor.  He can always find a way to make me laugh, even when I'm feeling down.
I totally agree!  Flash is the best!
He is!  We're both lucky to have him as a hero.
